faq.question: How to order a transfer?
faq.answer: You just need to specify the place of departure, the place of arrival and the date of the tour/transfer. Choose a driver-guide and place an order.

faq.question: How to pay?
faq.answer: Payment is made in cash, only after the end of the trip.

faq.question: Can I book multi-day tours?
faq.answer: You can pre-book and plan as many trips as you need at the time of your arrival in Georgia.

faq.question: What language to speak?
faq.answer: You can specify in advance the language in which you will communicate with the driver-guide.
